title: Danger Assessment Tool for Domestic Abuse
desc: The Danger Assessment Tool for Domestic Abuse predicts risk of death by an intimate partner (IP) in a violent intimate relationship.

orgreference.text: Snider C, Webster D, O'Sullivan CS, Campbell J. Intimate partner violence: development of a brief risk assessment for the emergency department. Acad Emerg Med. 2009;16(11):1208-16.
